name: Classic Wings
description: Seasoned with salt and pepper, allowing the natural flavor of the tender chicken meat.

name: Buffalo
description: Crispy chicken wings tossed in spicy buffalo sauce, served with celery sticks and creamy ranch dressing.

name: Garlic Parmesan
description: Succulent chicken wings coated in a savory garlic parmesan sauce, garnished with parsley, and served with marinara sauce.

name: Barbeque
description: Smothered in a sweet and smoky barbecue sauce, blend of tomato paste, molasses, vinegar, and spices.

name: Honey BBQ
description: Tender chicken wings glazed with sweet and tangy barbecue sauce, sprinkled with sesame seeds, and served with blue cheese dressing.

name: Sweet Chili
description: Tossed in a tantalizing sweet chili sauce, accented with hints of garlic, ginger, and soy sauce.

name: Honey Lemon
description: Coated in a luscious honey lemon glaze, and garnished with zesty lemon zest.

name: Terikayi
description: Marinated in a sweet and savory sauce made from soy sauce, brown sugar, ginger, garlic, and mirin, delivering a deliciously sticky glaze with an Asian-inspired twist.

name: Honey Mustard
description: Coated in a tangy and sweet honey mustard sauce, made from a combination of honey, Dijon mustard, mayonnaise, and spices.

name: Classice Burger
description: Juicy beef patty, melted cheddar cheese, crisp lettuce, ripe tomatoes, onions, and tangy pickles, served on a toasted brioche bun.

name: Classic Cheeseburger
description: Juicy beef patty topped with melted American cheese, crisp lettuce, ripe tomatoes, onions, pickles, and a dollop of tangy ketchup and mustard, all sandwiched between a soft sesame seed bun.

name: Veggie Delight
description: Grilled portobello mushroom, roasted red peppers, caramelized onions, avocado slices, fresh arugula, and creamy goat cheese.

name: Double Patty
description: two juicy beef patties cooked to perfection and stacked high with layers of melted American cheese, crisp lettuce, ripe tomato slices, crunchy pickles, and sliced onions.

name: Signature BBQ Chicken
description: Grilled chicken breast smothered in tangy barbecue sauce, topped with crispy bacon, melted pepper jack cheese, and crunchy onion rings on a sesame seed bun.

name: Bacon BBQ
description: Beef patty topped with crispy bacon strips, melted cheddar cheese, caramelized onions, and a generous drizzle of smoky barbecue sauce

name: Mini Burger Bites
description: Tender beef patty seasoned to perfection, topped with a dollop of tangy ketchup, a slice of melted cheese, and a crisp pickle, all nestled between soft, freshly baked mini buns.

name: Classic Fries
description: Crispy on the outside and fluffy on the inside, classic French fries are seasoned with salt and served hot and fresh.

name: Curly Fries
description: Twist of golden-brown spirals of crispy potato goodness seasoned to perfection with a blend of savory spices.

name: Crinkle Cut
description: Crinkle Cut Fries, featuring thick potato slices with signature crinkle-cut edges.

name: Wedges
description: Thick-cut potato wedges seasoned to perfection and oven-baked to crispy perfection.

name: Tater Tots
description: Crispy perfection of bite-sized potato nuggets fried to golden brown perfection.

name: Crisscross Cuts
description: Uniquely cut into a crisscross pattern for maximum crispy texture.

name: Classic Nachos
description: Crispy tortilla chips topped with melted cheese, jalapeños, diced tomatoes, black olives, and green onions, served with a side of salsa and sour cream for dipping.

name: Loaded Beef
description: Seasoned ground beef, melted cheese, refried beans, diced tomatoes, sliced jalapeños, and a dollop of guacamole and sour cream, offering a satisfying blend of flavors and textures.

name: Chicken Fajita
description: Grilled chicken strips seasoned with fajita spices, melted cheese, sautéed bell peppers and onions, diced tomatoes, black beans, and a drizzle of chipotle ranch dressing.

name: Pulled Pork
description: Pulled pork atop crispy tortilla chips, smothered in melted cheese, tangy barbecue sauce, diced onions, jalapeños, and a drizzle of creamy coleslaw dressing.

name: Vegetarian
description: Topped with black beans, corn, diced tomatoes, bell peppers, onions, sliced olives, and melted cheese.

name: Taco
description: Crispy tortilla chips topped with seasoned ground beef or turkey, shredded lettuce, diced tomatoes, black beans, shredded cheese, and a dollop of guacamole and sour cream.

name: Burger and Fries
description: Signature Burger, juicy beef patty topped with melted cheese, crisp lettuce, ripe tomato slices, onions, pickles, and a dollop of tangy ketchup and mustard, and a generous serving of our crispy and golden French Fries

name: Overload Sides
description: Ultimate Trio Platter, where three all-time favorites unite for a feast of epic proportions!

name: Impossible Burger
description: Whether you're a vegetarian, vegan, or simply looking to reduce your meat consumption, our Impossible Burger is the perfect choice for you.

name: Fries Platter
description: Classic favorites or adventurous flavors, our Fries Platter is a feast of crispy goodness that's perfect for sharing or enjoying all to yourself!

name: Mini Burger Bites Platter
description: Classic favorites burger in bite sizes. Big flavor in every bite!
